scripts.build-angular: cd mustakuusi-angular && npm install && npm run build -- --base-href /r/ --deploy-url /r/ && cd .. && mv dist/r/browser/* dist/r && rm -rf dist/r/browser
scripts.build-preact: cd mustakuusi-preact && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build-react: cd mustakuusi-react && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build-solid: cd mustakuusi-solid && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build-svelte: cd mustakuusi-svelte && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && mv dist/y/client/* dist/y && rm -rf dist/y/client
scripts.build-vue: cd mustakuusi-vue && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build-all: npm install && npm run build-angular && npm run build-preact && npm run build-react && npm run build-solid && npm run build-svelte && npm run build-vue
